1.3. dates¶

1.3.1. date¶

Synopsis:Generate random dates.
Created:2011-08-01
Author:DataONE (Vieglais, Dahl)

Functions

generate() Generate a dataoneTypes.DateTime with a random datetime
now() Generate a date with the current UTC date and time
random_date([earliest, latest]) Generate a random date somewhere between earliest and latest.
